group_1.textRight: (I knew it, she came back quickly.)
...Huh?
H-hold on, please calm yourself, Lady Nayuta.
People are staring.@We can talk outside...
I see, that is what happened...@I understand the situation...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I have no idea what is going on.
But from what I have heard,@he is trying to denounce Papa's story.
The only thing I can think of@is that he has been imprisoned...

group_1.textRight: (I haven't heard anything from the professor...)
(This is a completely unexpected crisis...@But...in this situation...)
(I could sever the relationship between@Nayuta and Touka...)
There is one more indirect thing,@though I can only make a guess.
There was one remark that could not be taken as@denying him...
That your uncle could bring the story to the public@through a scientific point of view.
If that is true, then I think he is trying to confirm@your father's story.

group_1.textLeft: Then why would he capture Papa...?

group_1.textRight: ...To claim your father's work as his own.
Proof of the existence of Magical Girls,@the impact of it would turn the world upside-down.
If the public recognizes that it isn't some tall tale,@your uncle will be basking in the limelight.

group_1.textLeft: But in order to explain that,@he would need Papa too.

group_1.textRight: That would be an inconvenience for your uncle,@given how he speaks ill of folklore.
Besides, Lady Nayuta, you have been seen@associating with your cousin Lady Touka lately.
She is a prodigy of science.
If she asks anything of you, you should be careful.

group_1.textLeft: Uncle is denying Father,@or trying to steal his accomplishments...

group_1.textRight: Either way, something bad is happening.

group_1.textLeft: And if Touka is supporting this...@But, Touka was different last time!

group_1.textRight: As a Magius, she selfishly tried to kill people.
Do you honestly think she would be reformed@so easily...?

group_1.textLeft: You think she may be lying...?

group_1.textRight: It wouldn't be a surprise to learn that she is involved@with your father being confined.

group_1.narration: Papa said this,@but Uncle's research is compleeetely useless,@isn't it?
Papa is a doctor@and can help looots of people,@and I'm a genius, too,@so I can help looots of people,
but isn't it embarrassing@that Uncle only cares about meaningless folklore?
I didn't believe what Papa said,@but when I saw this, I thought "Ohhh!"
Magical Girls: Their Hope and Despair
Do people that work with folklore read too much manga?
I want to tell you the truth,@but I'm sure you would never be convinced@hearing it from me.
So at the very least,@I want to pluck the seeds sprouting misfortune@from Nayuta Satomi and Touka Satomi,@so that this conflict does not end in catastrophe...
